text_blocks.content: Fwd: Re: Interviews From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Date 2019/08/16 13:43 Subject: Fwd: Re: Interviews Attachments: TEXT.htm

Good afternoon, Per the below, OIG would like to interview you regarding the incident last weekend involving EPSTEIN, Jeffrey, reg. no. 76318-054. Please call Special Agent (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) at 202-853 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) at your convenience.
Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) f. (646)836-7665
Per the attached OIG would like to interview the following staff members.
Sent from mobile device, please excuse typos.
Special Agent Office of the Inspector General 1 Battery Park Plaza, 29th floor New York, NY 10004 202-853 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Cell 212-908 Office (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @USDOJ.GOV

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain with redactions. The content is related to an investigation involving Jeffrey Epstein.
